title: Level 2 Search Coil Magnetometer AC Magnetic Field Burst (8192S/s) Data - J. Burch, O. Le Contel (SWRI, LPP)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/mms/mms2/scm/brst/l2/scb/2015/09/mms2_scm_brst_l2_scb_20150901121114_v2.2.1.cdf. The most common cadence, 122072 [ns] = PT0.000122072S, occurred for 56.6902% of the 2693554 timesteps.
info.contact: J. Burch, O. Le Contel @ SWRI, LPP
